description: a(1)=1; a(n)= sum(p \ n, a(p-1)), where sum is over all primes p that divide n, with multiplicity.
links: Joerg Arndt, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: a(1) = 1 and a(n) = A064415(n) for n>=2. [_Joerg Arndt_, Apr 08 2014]
prog: (PARI) a(n)=if (n<=1, 1, my(F=factor(n)); sum(e=1, #F[,1], F[e,2] * a(F[e,1]-1) ) );vector(200, n, a(n)) \\ _Joerg Arndt_, Apr 08 2014
author: _Leroy Quet_, Apr 20 2000
